mapper.select: SELECT a.mid, a.rdate, a.rcheck, a.roomid, a.rid, a.rimg FROM reservation a LEFT JOIN result b ON a.rid = b.rid WHERE a.mid=#{mid} AND a.rcheck=1 AND b.rid IS NULL ORDER BY a.rid DESC
SELECT a.mid, a.rdate, a.rcheck, a.roomid, a.rid, a.rimg FROM reservation a LEFT JOIN result b ON a.rid = b.rid WHERE a.mid=#{mid} AND a.rcheck=1 AND b.rid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.rid DESC
select * from reservation where mid=#{mid} and rcheck=0 order by rid desc
select distinct a.rid, mid, rdate, rcheck, roomid, rimg from reservation a , result b where mid=#{mid} and rcheck=1 order by a.rid desc
